If the field is hidden in the form settings (you’ve not just done it with css) it’s converted to a standard input field type text you should just be able to do
```$(input[value="feature_1"]).val('true').change();

$(input[value="feature_1"]).val('false').change();```
My only other thought if that doesn’t work is to change it before you submit the form e.g. just update it every time the click function happens
